beersBottle.name: Hoegaarden Rosee
beersBottle.description: Hoegaarden Rosee is a Belgian wheat beer infused with natural rosehip extracts, giving it a delicate pink hue and a fragrant, fruity aroma. Its taste combines subtle citrus notes with a light, refreshing sweetness, making it perfect for summer evenings or as an aperitif.

beersBottle.name: Kruger Export
beersBottle.description: Kruger Export is a classic Belgian lager with a smooth and well-balanced malt profile. It has a light golden color, a gentle hop bitterness, and a crisp, clean finish. This beer is ideal for casual drinking and pairs well with light snacks and grilled dishes.

beersBottle.name: Rhino Pale Ale
beersBottle.description: Rhino Pale Ale is an Indian Pale Ale featuring bold hop flavors balanced by a smooth malt backbone. Expect aromas of tropical fruits, citrus, and a touch of floral notes. The moderate bitterness and medium body make it an excellent choice for hop lovers seeking complexity and refreshment.

beersBottle.name: Irish Guinness
beersBottle.description: Irish Guinness is a world-famous stout known for its deep, dark color and creamy, velvety texture. It offers a rich roasted malt aroma with hints of coffee and chocolate. Smooth and slightly bitter, Guinness is perfect for pairing with hearty foods or enjoying on its own as a full-flavored experience.

beersBottle.name: Corona Extra
beersBottle.description: Corona Extra is a light Mexican lager with a crisp, clean taste and a pale golden color. It has mild malt sweetness, subtle hop bitterness, and a refreshing finish. Often served with a lime wedge, Corona is ideal for hot days, beach outings, or casual gatherings.

draftBeers.name: Michelob Ultra
draftBeers.description: Michelob Ultra is a light American lager with a crisp, clean taste and very low carbohydrate content. It has subtle malt sweetness with a gentle hop aroma and a refreshing finish, ideal for active lifestyles and casual drinking.

draftBeers.name: Bud Light
draftBeers.description: Bud Light is a popular American light lager with a smooth and refreshing flavor. It has mild malt character, low bitterness, and a clean finish, making it an easy-drinking beer for social events and casual settings.

draftBeers.name: Pilsner Urquell
draftBeers.description: Pilsner Urquell is the original Czech pilsner, renowned for its golden color, rich malt aroma, and distinctive hop bitterness. It has a crisp, slightly sweet flavor with a smooth, refreshing finish, perfect for pairing with hearty dishes or enjoying on its own.

draftBeers.name: Guinness Draught
draftBeers.description: Guinness Draught is the iconic Irish stout, famous for its dark color, creamy texture, and roasted malt flavors. It offers hints of coffee and chocolate with a smooth, slightly bitter finish, making it a perfect companion to rich dishes or relaxing evenings.

draftBeers.name: Carlton Draught
draftBeers.description: Carlton Draught is a classic Australian lager known for its bright golden color and balanced flavor. It has light malt sweetness, gentle hop bitterness, and a clean, crisp finish. Perfect for barbecues, social gatherings, and casual enjoyment.

nonAlcoholicBeers.name: Heineken 0.0
nonAlcoholicBeers.description: Heineken 0.0 is a non-alcoholic lager that delivers the classic Heineken taste without the alcohol. It features a balanced maltiness with subtle hop bitterness and a crisp, refreshing finish.

nonAlcoholicBeers.name: Corona Cero 0.0
nonAlcoholicBeers.description: Corona Cero 0.0 is a light and refreshing non-alcoholic beer from Mexico. It maintains the crisp and mild flavor of the original Corona, with subtle citrus notes, perfect for enjoying any time of the day.

nonAlcoholicBeers.name: Budweiser Zero
nonAlcoholicBeers.description: Budweiser Zero is a non-alcoholic version of the classic Budweiser lager. It features smooth malt flavors, light hop aroma, and a clean, crisp finish, making it ideal for social occasions without alcohol.

nonAlcoholicBeers.name: Athletic Brewing Co. Free Wave
nonAlcoholicBeers.description: Athletic Brewing Co. Free Wave is a non-alcoholic hazy IPA with tropical fruit aromas, a smooth mouthfeel, and balanced bitterness. Perfect for craft beer lovers seeking flavor without alcohol.

nonAlcoholicBeers.name: Clausthaler Original (Non-Alcoholic)
nonAlcoholicBeers.description: Clausthaler Original is a premium German non-alcoholic beer with rich malt character, mild hop bitterness, and a smooth, satisfying finish. Ideal for those seeking a traditional beer taste without alcohol.

nonAlcoholicCocktails.name: Shirley Temple
nonAlcoholicCocktails.description: Shirley Temple is a classic non-alcoholic cocktail made with ginger ale, grenadine, and a splash of orange juice. Garnished with a maraschino cherry, it’s sweet, fizzy, and refreshing.

nonAlcoholicCocktails.name: Virgin Mojito
nonAlcoholicCocktails.description: Virgin Mojito is a refreshing mocktail combining fresh mint leaves, lime juice, sugar, and soda water. It has a bright, citrusy flavor with a cool minty finish, perfect for warm days.

nonAlcoholicCocktails.name: Virgin Pina Colada
nonAlcoholicCocktails.description: Virgin Pina Colada is a tropical blend of pineapple juice, coconut cream, and crushed ice. Sweet and creamy with a tropical aroma, it captures the classic flavor of a pina colada without alcohol.

nonAlcoholicCocktails.name: Arnold Palmer
nonAlcoholicCocktails.description: Arnold Palmer is a refreshing mix of iced tea and lemonade, offering a perfect balance of sweet and tart flavors. It’s a classic non-alcoholic drink ideal for quenching thirst on a hot day.

nonAlcoholicCocktails.name: Cranberry Ginger Fizz
nonAlcoholicCocktails.description: Cranberry Ginger Fizz is a sparkling mocktail made with cranberry juice, ginger ale, and a hint of lime. It has a tangy, slightly spicy flavor with effervescent bubbles for a festive, refreshing drink.

aperitifs.name: Zero Proof Spritz
aperitifs.description: Zero Proof Spritz is a refreshing non-alcoholic take on the classic spritz, combining sparkling water, citrus flavors, and a hint of bitters. Light, bubbly, and perfect for summer afternoons.

aperitifs.name: Ness & Malone Spritz
aperitifs.description: Ness & Malone Spritz is a non-alcoholic sparkling aperitif with a perfect balance of fruity and herbal notes. It’s elegant, slightly bitter, and a great pre-dinner drink.

aperitifs.name: Garden of Dreams
aperitifs.description: Garden of Dreams is a sophisticated non-alcoholic aperitif infused with floral and botanical flavors. It’s light, aromatic, and ideal for a relaxing evening.

aperitifs.name: Nibble Bitter Herb Mocktail
aperitifs.description: Nibble Bitter Herb Mocktail is a complex, herbaceous non-alcoholic drink with subtle bitter notes, inspired by classic Italian aperitifs. It’s crisp, refreshing, and sophisticated.

aperitifs.name: Non‑Alcoholic Digestif Infusion
aperitifs.description: Non‑Alcoholic Digestif Infusion is a gentle, aromatic infusion of herbs and spices, designed to aid digestion after meals. Smooth, lightly sweet, and pleasantly warming.

wines.name: Finca Las Moras Syrah
wines.description: Finca Las Moras Syrah is a bold Argentine red wine with rich notes of blackberries, plums, and a hint of pepper. Smooth tannins make it perfect for pairing with grilled meats or hearty dishes.

wines.name: Jacob's Creek Shiraz Cabernet
wines.description: Jacob's Creek Shiraz Cabernet is a classic Australian blend, offering flavors of dark berries, plum, and subtle oak. Medium-bodied with a smooth finish, it complements red meats and pasta dishes.

wines.name: Robert Mondavi Woodbridge Zinfandel
wines.description: Robert Mondavi Woodbridge Zinfandel is a rich Californian wine with ripe berry flavors, a hint of spice, and smooth, velvety tannins. Ideal for BBQs and pasta with tomato-based sauces.

wines.name: Casal Garcia Rosé
wines.description: Casal Garcia Rosé is a light, crisp Portuguese wine with floral aromas and fresh red fruit flavors. Perfect as an aperitif or paired with salads and seafood.

wines.name: Vega del Campo Verdejo
wines.description: Vega del Campo Verdejo is a refreshing Spanish white wine with citrus, apple, and herbaceous notes. Crisp acidity makes it a great match for fish, light pasta, and fresh salads.

warmDrinks.name: Cappuccino
warmDrinks.description: Cappuccino is a classic Italian coffee drink made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and frothy milk foam. Rich, creamy, and aromatic, perfect for a morning boost.

warmDrinks.name: Latte
warmDrinks.description: Latte is a smooth Italian coffee beverage made with espresso and steamed milk, topped with a small layer of foam. Mild, creamy, and ideal for relaxing coffee breaks.

warmDrinks.name: Hot Chocolate
warmDrinks.description: Hot Chocolate is a comforting sweet drink made with rich cocoa, sugar, and milk. Perfect for cozy evenings, with a smooth and velvety texture.

warmDrinks.name: Matcha Latte
warmDrinks.description: Matcha Latte is a Japanese green tea drink made with finely ground matcha powder and steamed milk. Earthy, vibrant, and slightly sweet, it’s a healthy energizing option.

warmDrinks.name: Herbal Tea
warmDrinks.description: Herbal Tea is a soothing caffeine-free drink made from a blend of dried herbs, flowers, and fruits. Refreshing, calming, and perfect for any time of day.

soft drinks.name: Coca-Cola
soft drinks.description: Coca-Cola is a classic carbonated soft drink with a sweet, refreshing taste and a hint of caramel flavor. Perfect for quenching thirst anytime.

soft drinks.name: Pepsi
soft drinks.description: Pepsi is a popular cola beverage with a slightly sweeter and citrusy flavor profile. Crisp, bubbly, and enjoyed worldwide.

soft drinks.name: Fanta Orange
soft drinks.description: Fanta Orange is a fruity, carbonated soft drink bursting with vibrant orange flavor. Sweet, refreshing, and perfect for a sunny day.

soft drinks.name: Sprite
soft drinks.description: Sprite is a lemon-lime flavored soft drink with a crisp, clean taste. Light, bubbly, and ideal for cooling down on a hot day.

soft drinks.name: Schweppes Tonic Water
soft drinks.description: Schweppes Tonic Water is a slightly bitter, carbonated beverage infused with quinine. Crisp, refreshing, and often used as a mixer in cocktails.

refreshments.name: Bruschetta
refreshments.description: Classic Italian appetizer with toasted bread rubbed with garlic and topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, and olive oil.

refreshments.name: Caesar Salad
refreshments.description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, croutons, and grated Parmesan cheese. A fresh and tangy favorite.

refreshments.name: Garlic Bread
refreshments.description: Toasted bread with a rich garlic butter spread. Crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, perfect as a side or snack.

refreshments.name: Caprese Salad
refreshments.description: Fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, and basil drizzled with balsamic reduction. A light, refreshing Italian salad.

refreshments.name: Mozzarella Sticks
refreshments.description: Breaded and fried mozzarella cheese sticks served with marinara sauce. Gooey, cheesy, and deliciously crispy.

refreshments.name: Chicken Wings
refreshments.description: Juicy chicken wings baked to perfection and tossed in a savory sauce. Perfect for sharing as an appetizer or snack.

refreshments.name: Spring Rolls
refreshments.description: Crispy rolls filled with fresh vegetables and served with a light dipping sauce. A crunchy and tasty appetizer.

refreshments.name: Hummus with Pita
refreshments.description: Creamy chickpea hummus served with warm pita bread. A smooth, protein-rich, and flavorful snack.

refreshments.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
refreshments.description: Mushrooms filled with a savory mix of cheese, herbs, and breadcrumbs, baked to golden perfection.

refreshments.name: Nachos with Cheese
refreshments.description: Crispy tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapeños, and optional salsa. Perfectly cheesy and flavorful.

savoryMouthPleasure.name: Beef Sliders
savoryMouthPleasure.description: Mini beef burgers served on soft buns with cheese, lettuce, and a special sauce. Perfect for sharing or as a hearty snack.

savoryMouthPleasure.name: Loaded Nachos
savoryMouthPleasure.description: Crispy tortilla chips loaded with melted cheese, jalapeños, beans, and optional sour cream and salsa. A perfect appetizer for sharing.

savoryMouthPleasure.name: Stuffed Jalapeños
savoryMouthPleasure.description: Spicy jalapeños stuffed with cheese and baked until golden. A flavorful and slightly spicy appetizer.

savoryMouthPleasure.name: Mini Quiches
savoryMouthPleasure.description: Individual baked quiches with a buttery crust filled with eggs, cheese, and vegetables. Perfect for brunch or as an appetizer.

savoryMouthPleasure.name: Prosciutto & Melon
savoryMouthPleasure.description: Sweet melon slices paired with thinly sliced prosciutto. A classic Italian appetizer balancing sweet and salty flavors.

savoryMouthPleasure.name: Deviled Eggs
savoryMouthPleasure.description: Hard-boiled eggs filled with a creamy seasoned yolk mixture. A classic, savory, and tangy appetizer.

savoryMouthPleasure.name: Calamari Rings
savoryMouthPleasure.description: Lightly battered and fried squid rings served with aioli. Crispy outside and tender inside, perfect as a seafood appetizer.

savoryMouthPleasure.name: Charcuterie Board
savoryMouthPleasure.description: An assortment of cured meats, cheeses, fruits, and nuts. Perfect for sharing and pairing with wine.

savoryMouthPleasure.name: Spicy Chicken Bites
savoryMouthPleasure.description: Juicy chicken pieces tossed in a spicy sauce. Perfect for those who love a kick of heat in their appetizers.

savoryMouthPleasure.name: Garlic Shrimp
savoryMouthPleasure.description: Shrimp sautéed in garlic and butter, seasoned with herbs. A flavorful and rich seafood appetizer.

pancakesAndWaffles.name: Classic Pancakes
pancakesAndWaffles.description: Fluffy classic pancakes served with butter and maple syrup. A timeless breakfast favorite.

pancakesAndWaffles.name: Blueberry Pancakes
pancakesAndWaffles.description: Soft pancakes loaded with fresh blueberries and served with syrup. Sweet and fruity breakfast delight.

pancakesAndWaffles.name: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
pancakesAndWaffles.description: Delicious pancakes filled with chocolate chips and served warm. Perfect for chocolate lovers.

pancakesAndWaffles.name: Banana Pancakes
pancakesAndWaffles.description: Fluffy pancakes with sliced bananas and a drizzle of syrup. Sweet and satisfying breakfast option.

pancakesAndWaffles.name: Strawberry Waffles
pancakesAndWaffles.description: Crispy Belgian waffles topped with fresh strawberries and cream. A sweet and fruity treat.

pancakesAndWaffles.name: Belgian Waffles with Cream
pancakesAndWaffles.description: Classic Belgian waffles served with whipped cream. Light, fluffy, and perfect for breakfast or dessert.

pancakesAndWaffles.name: Nutella Pancakes
pancakesAndWaffles.description: Soft pancakes generously spread with creamy Nutella. Rich and chocolatey indulgence.

pancakesAndWaffles.name: Maple Syrup Waffles
pancakesAndWaffles.description: Crispy waffles served with authentic maple syrup. Sweet, buttery, and quintessentially Canadian.

pancakesAndWaffles.name: Cinnamon Apple Pancakes
pancakesAndWaffles.description: Pancakes flavored with cinnamon and apple slices. Warm, spiced, and comforting breakfast option.

pancakesAndWaffles.name: Chocolate Waffles
pancakesAndWaffles.description: Belgian waffles infused with chocolate and served with a dusting of cocoa. Perfect for dessert lovers.

littleHunger.name: Avocado Toast
littleHunger.description: Toasted bread topped with creamy avocado, a sprinkle of salt, pepper, and optional chili flakes. Healthy and filling snack.

littleHunger.name: Mini Caprese Skewers
littleHunger.description: Cherry tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil on skewers drizzled with balsamic glaze. A fresh and light appetizer.

littleHunger.name: Falafel Bites
littleHunger.description: Crispy falafel balls made from chickpeas and herbs, perfect as a small snack or starter.

littleHunger.name: Mini Fish Tacos
littleHunger.description: Small soft tacos filled with grilled fish, cabbage, and a tangy sauce. Perfect light Mexican snack.

littleHunger.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
littleHunger.description: Bell peppers filled with a savory mixture of rice, vegetables, and spices. Light but satisfying snack.

littleHunger.name: Mini Sausage Rolls
littleHunger.description: Flaky pastry filled with seasoned sausage meat, baked to golden perfection. Traditional British snack.

littleHunger.name: Cheese & Olive Platter
littleHunger.description: Selection of cheeses paired with olives. Perfect for light bites or sharing with friends.

littleHunger.name: Mini Veggie Spring Rolls
littleHunger.description: Crispy spring rolls filled with vegetables. A light, crunchy snack perfect for sharing.

littleHunger.name: Mini Chicken Quesadillas
littleHunger.description: Small tortillas filled with grilled chicken and cheese. Perfect Mexican snack or starter.

littleHunger.name: Mini Bruschetta with Mushrooms
littleHunger.description: Toasted bread topped with sautéed mushrooms, garlic, and herbs. Flavorful Italian appetizer.
